titles.title: Kick Start to College Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage college savings by providing a Federal income tax credit to match contributions to Coverdell education savings accounts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/27/2006--Introduced. Kick Start to College Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow parents a tax credit for contributions to a qualified higher education subaccount established under a Coverdell education savings account to pay their childrens' higher education expenses.
